'''13w09b''' is the twelfth [[snapshot]] for [[Java Edition 1.5]], released on February 27, 2013<ref>https://web.archive.org/web/0/https://www.mojang.com/2013/02/minecraft-snapshot-13w09b/</ref> to fix some of the bugs and crashes in the [[13w09a]] snapshot. It was also the first version to include [[Minecraft Realms]].

== Additions ==
=== Command format ===
'''{{cmd|effect}}'''
* Command: {{cmd|effect <player> <effect> [<seconds>] [<amplifier>]}}.
** Maximum number of seconds is 1,000,000.
* Amplifier increases level of the chosen status effect.
** Maximum number for the amplifier is 4.

=== General ===
'''[[Minecraft Realms]]<ref>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=MNZFI04cS5c</ref>'''
* Only added to few randomly chosen players.
** Exactly 100 players were chosen.<ref>http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rlBFEl29s8c</ref>
* Feature is accessed through button in the [[title screen]].
